data.text: Wukhudi, a Yave, mu mutu wumbimbi ;
bobo banyindulanga zikhanu zimbimbi mu mintima miawu
Beti kitula ludimi luawu meno banga lu nioka ;
Wukheba, a Yave, mu mutu wumbimbi.
Kadi tala zitsatu zi batu bambimbi zivangama, a Yave.
Bika makala ma mbazu mabua va bawu.
Bika mimvuezi mibika zingila mu tsi ;
Nzebi ti Yave weti vana luvovomo lusonga kuidi nsukami
Bukiedika, basonga bela zitisa dizina diaku
